org.drip.exposure.universe

Class MarketPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.exposure.universe.MarketPath

  • public class MarketPath
extends java.lang.Object
    MarketPath holds the Vertex Market Realizations at the Trajectory Vertexes along the Path of a Simulation. The References are:

    - Burgard, C., and M. Kjaer (2013): Funding Strategies, Funding Costs Risk 24 (12) 82-87. - Burgard, C., and M. Kjaer (2014): PDE Representations of Derivatives with Bilateral Counter-party Risk and Funding Costs Journal of Credit Risk 7 (3) 1-19. - Burgard, C., and M. Kjaer (2014): In the Balance Risk 24 (11) 72-75. - Gregory, J. (2009): Being Two-faced over Counter-party Credit Risk Risk 20 (2) 86-90. - Piterbarg, V. (2010): Funding Beyond Discounting: Collateral Agreements and Derivatives Pricing Risk 21 (2) 97-102.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
